metadata.title: USN-6576-1 -- Linux kernel (OEM) vulnerability
metadata.description: Lonial Con discovered that the netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly handle an expired catchall element in some situations, leading to a use-after-free vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6576-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-oem-6.1-headers-6.1.0-1028 - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-image-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-tools-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-oem-6.1-tools-6.1.0-1028 - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-modules-ivsc-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-buildinfo-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-modules-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-modules-iwlwifi-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-headers-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-modules-ipu6-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1028-oem - 6.1.0-1028.28 linux-oem-6.1-tools-host - 6.1.0-1028.28 No subscription required  linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-headers-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-headers-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-headers-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-image-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-image-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-image-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-image-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-tools-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-tools-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-tools-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-tools-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-headers-oem-22.04 - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-oem-22.04c - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-oem-22.04b - 6.1.0.1028.29 linux-oem-22.04a - 6.1.0.1028.29 No subscription required
